full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA CHEN TSANGS PA DKAR PO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BA'I CHO GA MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES LHA CHEN TSANGS PA DKAR PO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, AER TE NI NO YON HU THUG THU LUNG BSTAN GYIS, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA SNYING STOBS KYIS BRTEN PA'I BYIN RLABS KYIS, ,SKYE 'GRO MTHO DMAN KUN GYI BZANG NGAN NANG DANG DAR GUD SOGS THOGS MED DU 'BEBS NAS SEMS CAN KYI DON BYED PA LA MER GEN BLA MA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BHU SU KU SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SLOB PA'I SHES RAB DANG LDAN PA HUR TSA PI LIG THU BLO BZANG SHES RAB PA'O,, ,,)
